conduits.name: Unrelenting Cold
conduits.description: Frozen Orb's damage is increased by <dynamic>10.0% - 40%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Shivering Core
conduits.description: Blizzard's damage and movement speed reduction are increased by <dynamic>5.0% - 25%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Icy Propulsion
conduits.description: While Icy Veins is active, your critical hits reduce its cooldown by <dynamic>0.30 sec - 1.92 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Ice Bite
conduits.description: Increases the damage of Ice Lance against frozen enemies by <dynamic>10.0% - 50%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Winter's Protection
conduits.description: The cooldown of Ice Block is reduced by <dynamic>30 sec - 90 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Flow of Time
conduits.description: The cooldown of Blink is reduced by <dynamic>1.0 sec - 5 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Grounding Surge
conduits.description: Successfully interrupting an enemy with Counterspell reduces its cooldown by <dynamic>1.0 sec - 8 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Infernal Cascade
conduits.description: While Combustion is active, your Fire Blast grants you <dynamic>3.0%  - 10%</dynamic> increased Fire damage for 5 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

conduits.name: Master Flame
conduits.description: Flamestrike's damage and radius are increased by <dynamic>6.0% - 20%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Arcane Prodigy
conduits.description: Arcane Missiles reduce the cooldown of Arcane Power by <dynamic>0.1 sec - 1.5 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Nether Precision
conduits.description: Consuming Clearcasting increases the damage of your next 2 Arcane Blasts by <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Discipline of the Grove
conduits.description: Shifting Power channels <dynamic>5% - 50%</dynamic> faster.

conduits.name: Gift of the Lich
conduits.description: Deathborne's duration is increased by<dynamic> 3.0 sec - 10 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Ire of the Ascended
conduits.description: Radiant Spark increases the damage your spells deal to the target by an additional <dynamic>2.0% - 8%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Siphoned Malice
conduits.description: Each time a Mirror of Torment is consumed your spell damage is increased by <dynamic>1.0% - 2.4%</dynamic> for 10 sec, stacking 3 times.

conduits.name: Cryo-Freeze
conduits.description: While inside Ice Block, you heal for <dynamic>20% - 66.67%</dynamic> of your maximum health over the duration.

conduits.name: Diverted Energy
conduits.description: Your Barriers heal you for <dynamic>20% - 60%</dynamic> of the damage absorbed.

conduits.name: Magi's Brand
conduits.description: Touch of Magi accumulates an additional <dynamic>5.0% - 15%</dynamic> of the damage you deal.

conduits.name: Flame Accretion
conduits.description: Fireball grants <dynamic>5.0% - 15%</dynamic> Mastery when it fails to critically strike.

conduits.name: Artifice of the Archmage
conduits.description: Your Arcane Barrage has a <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic> chance to grant 2 Arcane Charges.

conduits.name: Incantation of Swiftness
conduits.description:
<spec>Arcane (Level 47)</spec>
<dynamic>Greater</dynamic>

Invisibility increases your movement speed by <dynamic>20%</dynamic> for 6 sec.

conduits.name: Tempest Barrier
conduits.description: Gain a shield that absorbs <dynamic>5.0% - 15%</dynamic> of your maximum health for 15 sec after you Blink.

conduits.name: Controlled Destruction
conduits.description: Pyroblast damage increased by <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic>.

covenants.name: Summon Steward
covenants.description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 20% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities for 4 min.

covenants.name: Purify Soul
covenants.description: Restores 20% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

covenants.name: Soulshape
covenants.description:
Turn into a Vulpin, teleporting 15 yds forward and increasing your movement speed by 50%. You may reactivate Soulshape every few sec to teleport again.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

covenants.name: Flicker
covenants.description: Teleports you forward 15 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

covenants.name: Fleshcraft
covenants.description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

covenants.name: Door of Shadows
covenants.description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

covenants.name: Radiant Spark
covenants.description:
Conjure a radiant spark that causes (76% of Spell power) Arcane damage instantly, and an additional (29.6% of Spell power) damage over 8 sec.

The target takes 10% increased damage from your direct damage spells, stacking each time they are struck. This effect ends after 4 spells.

covenants.name: Shifting Power
covenants.description:
Draw power from the ground beneath, dealing [(47.36% of Spell power) * 4 / 1] Nature damage over 4 sec to enemies within 18 yds. 

While channeling, your Mage ability cooldowns are reduced by (-- 3000 / 1000 * 4 / 1) sec over 4 sec.

covenants.name: Deathborne
covenants.description:
Transform into a powerful skeletal mage for 20 sec. 

While in the form of a skeletal mage, your Frostbolt, Fireball, and Arcane Blast hit up to 2 enemies near your target and your spell damage is increased by 10%.

covenants.name: Mirrors of Torment
covenants.description:
Conjure 3 mirrors to torment the enemy for 20 sec. Whenever the target casts a spell or ability, a mirror is consumed to inflict (75% of Spell power) Shadow damage and their movement and cast speed are slowed by 15%.

The final mirror will instead inflict (198% of Spell power) Shadow damage to the enemy, Rooting and Silencing them for 4 sec.

legendaries.name: Cold Front
legendaries.description: Casting 15 Frostbolts or Flurries calls down a Frozen Orb toward your target. Hitting an enemy player counts as double.

legendaries.name: Freezing Winds
legendaries.description: While Frozen Orb is active, you gain Fingers of Frost every 2.5 sec. While Frozen Orb is not active, each Frostbolt reduces the cooldown of Frozen Orb by 2.5 sec.

legendaries.name: Expanded Potential
legendaries.description: Your Fireball, Frostbolt and Arcane Blast have a chance to give you Expanded Potential, which causes your next Hot Streak, Brain Freeze or Clearcasting to not be consumed.

legendaries.name: Glacial Fragments
legendaries.description: Ice Lance has a 15% chance to explode into shards of ice when it hits a target, dealing (40% of Spell power) Frost damage to up to 5 enemies near your target. This chance is increased to 50% if your target is standing in a Blizzard.

legendaries.name: Slick Ice
legendaries.description: While Icy Veins is active, each Frostbolt you cast reduces the cast time of Frostbolt by 5%, stacking up to 10 times.

legendaries.name: Arcane Harmony
legendaries.description:
Increases the damage done by Arcane Missiles by 10%. 

Each time Arcane Missiles hits an enemy, the damage of your next Arcane Barrage is increased by 2%. This effect stacks.

legendaries.name: Arcane Bombardment
legendaries.description: Arcane Barrage deals an additional 40% damage against targets below 35% health.

legendaries.name: Siphon Storm
legendaries.description: Evocation grants 2 Arcane Charges, and while channeling Evocation, your Intellect is increased by 2% every 1 sec. Lasts 30 sec.

legendaries.name: Fevered Incantation
legendaries.description: Each consecutive critical strike you deal increases critical strike damage you deal by 2%.

legendaries.name: Firestorm
legendaries.description: When Hot Streak activates, you have a low chance to cause all Pyroblasts and Flamestrikes to have no cast time and be guaranteed critical strikes for 5 sec.

legendaries.name: Molten Skyfall
legendaries.description: Damaging an enemy with 30 Fireballs or Pyroblasts calls down a Meteor on your target. Hitting an enemy player counts as double.

legendaries.name: Sun King's Blessing
legendaries.description: After consuming 6 Hot Streaks, your next non-instant Pyroblast cast within 15 sec grants you Combustion for 6 sec.

legendaries.name: Triune Ward
legendaries.description: Casting any Barrier spell grants the effects of Blazing Barrier, Ice Barrier, and Prismatic Barrier. Each absorb shield has 40% effectiveness.

legendaries.name: Grisly Icicle
legendaries.description: Your Frost, Fire, and Arcane damage against enemies affected by Frost Nova is increased by 10% and no longer breaks it.
